about_the_game:
Embark on the world of elite snipers with 'Seek & Sniper.' Assuming the role of a rookie sniper, you'll find yourself facing challenging missions that will test your target identification and elimination skills.

Here, you don't just aim and shoot; every shot is a critical decision. The need to identify your targets based on detailed descriptions before they escape or harm another victim and eliminate them with a single precise shot makes each mission a complex puzzle.

Customization is the key to standing out in this world of precision, with a wide variety of precision rifles at your disposal. You can enhance your weapons to fit your gameplay style by adjusting aspects such as ammunition speed, accuracy, and more.

Prepare to become a master in the art of precision shooting, where every shot counts. Your journey will take you through a variety of challenging scenarios, from bustling urban landscapes to remote and unknown environments.

Connect the clues and find the target

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains content not appropriate for all ages, like blood, violence and gunshots.
